hr.p: This program is open to any Tuttle School student who is currently eligible for Free and Reduced Meals! This is an incredible program that is available to both Native American and Non-Native American Students. Please take a few minutes to apply!

em.span: What an awesome community we have!

The Tuttle Education Foundation's sole purpose is to raise money to put directly back into the classrooms for our students. Please contact them if you would like to help or donate directly on their website.
You can also find them on Facebook.
As always, Tuttle teachers and students appreciate everything you do for us!

div.class: custom_26484 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.strong: Congratulations to the Tuttle High School Band for earning a Superior rating at regional marching contest in Lawto, Oklahoma. This is the highest score the state of Oklahoma offers High School marching bands and the first step in the Band Sweepstakes Award. The Sweepstakes Award measures the quality of the total band program in Marching Band and Concert Band. A band is required to earn a Superior in each category throughout the year to receive the Band Sweepstakes Award. It has been many years since a Tuttle Band has received any of these awards. So, after many hot, summer practices and early morning wakeups, congratulations to the Tuttle Band students, Seth Boothby, and Steve Sharp for their hard work, dedication, and accomplishments!
View Part I of their performance here.
View Part II of their performance here.
